Reviews.Title: “Want bed bugs ad white trash owners? Stay here!”
Reviews.Author: Desery
Reviews.Content: We walked into our room and instantly you can smell the mold. There was trash in the drawers of the night stand and old beer in the mini fridge. There were bugs everywhere, a bed was covered in pee stains. We slept on top of our own blankets due to fear of bed bugs. There is a woman living in this filth with a 2 year old boy, don't worry she's friendly, if you give her liquor or a beer bong. White trash owners with no signs of formal education. This place is disgusting, do not stay here!

Reviews.Title: “must read!!! this place is horrible”
Reviews.Author: jen o
Reviews.Content: They seem to be really nice but watch out! when you first get there, they give you a paper to fill out with damages, make sure you inspect the house from floor to ceiling! we stayed here (parrot bay on 5th street, 2nd floor) and didnt get the deposit back (300.00) due to a TV CABLE not being pulled in - and we didnt even use the tv! they did follow with what they said about checking wrist bands, but once you made friends with the "guard" it was alright. the room we stayed in was nice, however i suggest you bring your own bedding x2. the sheets in BOTH double beds in our apartment had blood on them....can we say nasty?! and yes, i was a senior week renter, but our neighbors weren't - infact they lived there year round with a 3yr old daughter that they smoked weed in front of! they complained alot about noise too. One night, id say around 6 oour toilet got clogged and over flowed (do to puke) and they told us it wasnt their problem until the 11am the following morning. how nasty?! finally, We were late to return the key by literally 2 minutes, and they threatened to take out deposite money away. 2 minutes, really?! over all i will NEVER rent fro them again. the apartment appers to be nice, but it is FAR from it. never do it!

Reviews.Title: “good enough”
Reviews.Author: luckyagh
Reviews.Content: i was there last year at the margarita ville condo i think u call it, itsnt there anymore in parrot lagooon website anymore, but let me tell u , wasnt wow but worth it, was very cheap, we enjoyed, we cooked, slept, relax, i think was good enough, now im looking to go there again, but im scared after all this comment, i dont want to have bad luck,

Reviews.Title: “Do not ever make this mistake!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: rmdc29
Reviews.Content: I usually read reviews prior to booking. I made a mistake of not doing this before booking with parrot lagoon. We got there at 11am and tried to check-in (most hotels will allow you to do this if the room is ready),but we're told that we need to come back at 3pm. They gave us a room number and a parking permit. So far,so good....until 3pm. From the outside,the place did not look too good. I also did not expect to walk the two blocks and cross two streets to get to the boardwalk. I opened the door to the room....and SURPRISE!!!!!!!!!! There was a family sleeping in the room!!!!!!! It was the correct room and the lady told me that they have the room for the next three weeks. I pity them! Now, this is our blessing in disguise. The mix up with the booking landed us with no room since they only have a very small room which would not fit two adults and two kids. The positive part? I got refunded for my two day payment. I booked this hotel 8 days in advance. What security can you expect if they cannot track of what room is occupied and what is not? Can anybody just have the key in your room? I will never ever book in this hotel ever again!!!!! I cannot say for their cleanliness because I did not get to see the inside the room, but if the couch in the office is any indication of the condition of their rooms...I would say bring your own vaccum and sheets if you still dare to stay here! To end on a positive note, the staff was friendly enough. We got a room at a different hotel.

Reviews.Title: “black mold in room”
Reviews.Author: strickler
Reviews.Content: Horrible black mold in room number 42, had me pull out my inhaller, had to leave in the morning, lungs full of congestion. 4 days later still sick and heading to doctor for treatment. Mold was not only all thru bathroom shower, but on the walls above the bed where we slept. did not look until morning when I could not breath, room dirty, old q-tips on floor. blood on mattress. gross place. we paid to stay for two nights and could not handle it. Not enough parking, had to park on street each night. advertised on space, but all 3 lots were filled.

Reviews.Title: “what a dump!”
Reviews.Author: oldhippie99
Reviews.Content: a very flithy dump, with office staff that could care less about anything except how they can justify charging more then what was advertised. left there full of bug bites after 2 nites! went up the road found a much better place for less. never again will i give these people a dime.

Reviews.Title: “Worst Hotel I've EVERRRRRR stayed in...dont go!”
Reviews.Author: smyers4232
Reviews.Content: This hotel was the nastiest hotel ever!!! It smelled like musty urine and left all our clothes damp. When i unpacked my clothes at home it felt/smelled like someone spilt old mildewed water in my suitcase!!!!!!! There were ants and bugs everywhere, crumbs on the floor, stains on the comforter! We left with bite marks from the bugs. When hotel employees were told first day about the ants they said someone would spray they never came. Next day we asked again, they said they would send someone, again no one came!!!!!!! Rusty fishing hooks held a set of our curtains together, lucky for them we didnt get stuck by them but only by a miracle! Thats def a safety hazard esp if their are kids around. No internet unless you pay $10 a day eventhough when you book they tell you it includes internet. Please take your money elsewhere, i wish we wouldve read these reviews before we booked our vacation. Oh and btw....before all this we had a mess up with our reservation with them also and went through a big hassle getting it resolved. NEVER EVER AGAIN, it kind of ruined our whole trip!

Reviews.Title: “Completely appauled, disguisted, and both bitten all over! Worst hotel experience EVER!!”
Reviews.Author: pineappleprinsez
Reviews.Content: Worst booking and staying experience ever. I called the number on the website and asked questions about what they had. Was told internet, pool and mini fridge with microwave. We get a conformation from a different hotel. It took almost 2 weeks of frustrating issues to fix the issue. I never understood how it happened in the first place. The number got crossed over to Buckinham Hotel. I then, FINALLY, get an English understanding/speaking person to fix the issue. I said if my money wasn't refunded from the wrong place that said non refundable( even though wrong place and was never told non refundable when booking), I'm contacting Better Business Bureau. I'm now reserved at Parrot Lagoon and stayed in room #10. It was disguisting with the odor, damp, bugs, smallest mini fridge I ever saw, they used sharp fish hooks to have curtains together, air conditioner that sounded like it was in for a landing and about to crash. Ants EVERYWHERE!! I told them about it 1/2 hr into checking in and said they'd spray. The ants were worse when we got back. I then went down the next day to explain to them nothing was done about it and they're all over place in the shower, bathroom, in my clothes, bags of food, along the walls, night stand..just everywhere we walked. He didnt seem too concerned and said I'll have someone come up in a bit to spray. We were there for hours and no one came up. The towels were rough, very bad odor of musty, odor and smelled like somoene peed all over the room. All of our clothes smelled and were damp when we took them out of the suitcase. even after coming home I could smell that odor in my hair and bags. I felt sick over that smell while we stayed. I couldn't sleep on the very uncomfprtable bed and knowing the comforter had stains on it. I was so itchy and bitten the 2nd night and we both couldn't sleep comfortably on the beds and kept seeing different bugs in the room. I woke up every hour with worry and one time with feeling like something was crawling on my face. I do now have a bite on my jaw area. I can't get pics of all the bites but here's some. Ewwwwwww so disguisting and freaked out by this. I'll never recoomend this place or go there again. It scared me for life! Plus the walls were paper thin and we couldn't sleep hearing everthibg out the door. The floor would shake whe people would walk outside the hotel. PLEASE don't got there, not worth a fewer dollars less.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay for cheap”
Reviews.Author: tonilovesyoux3
Reviews.Content: I booked the "extremely small room" with 2 double beds in "Ocean Lodge" at the Parrot Lagoon Motel. The room was indeed small but it was just a place to sleep and shower at. Me and 3 friends stayed Saturday to Monday, for only $138 for the whole room.(plus tax...around 152 which is just about $40 per person!) The room was clean, as was the bathroom. They had maid service that gave us towels and took away the dirty ones. We chilled in here a couple of times, watched TV while eating pizza. Not bad at ALL. The Bathroom was tinier than expected and the door didn't lock, but we were brother,sister, boyfriend and friend, so it wasn't weird if anyone happened to walk in. lol It was pretty quiet too, except for the traffic outside. Didn't really hear any rowdy seniors there for beach week. ALSO, the beach was 2 blocks away!!!!! The staff was really nice and the parking was right next door. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone :)

Reviews.Title: “It's sure worth it!”
Reviews.Author: aimeelovesoc
Reviews.Content: The weather was great and the Memorial Day weekend was a perfect getaway for my dad and I. Not everything turned out the way we planned though. We started our trip early wanting to beat traffic on Friday morning. Half a way on rt50 our tire blew. Let me tell you - certainly not a way to start your long weekend. After a long ride down there, we finally made it to OC and were greeted by smiley faces and a nice surprise. We had stayed here before and been satisfied enough to come back again, but I was really impressed by the changes that they had made. The room was very clean and nice. Our housekeeper kept us stocked for the weekend with fresh towels and we spent a good portion of our time at the outdoor pool. I am definitely going back this summer again. Thank you for the great weekend, Parrot Lagoon Staff!

Reviews.Title: “DO NOT GO HERE........THE WORST PLACE POSSIBLE TO STAY”
Reviews.Author: pam018
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at Parrot Lagoon for several years up until last year! We always enjoyed it but last year it was horrible!!! We later found out that it was sold and not the same owners as before. Not only have the rates doubled, there were bugs galore, no carpeting on the floor which made it very slippery when coming in from the pool!!! We slipped several times on the floor, dirty bathrooms and not worth $1600.00 we paid for such a crappy condo!!! The so called crab feast never happened but the horrible bar-b-que was week old chicken and food we could not even eat!!! This was a real joke and we will not stay there again and am very upset to this day for the vacation we looked forward to was not a vacation at all, since we had to kill bugs constantly!!!!! The old owners were great, the new could care less and it's all about money to them, not a way to run a business. They should condemn this place!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Orkin man could get rich here”
Reviews.Author: Maddie82
Reviews.Content: Horrible hotel. No pool as advertised. Had to walk 5 blocks to pool. Loaded with bugs. Of course the staff doesn't speak English and the owner doesn't call back Tried to dispute it with my credit card and they wouldn't give us our money back . Even though we didn't stay there. Air conditioner didn't work and their were ants and bed bugs everywhere. Carper looked like it had been barfed on 100 times during senior week. This is one disgusting place!1

Reviews.Title: “Run for your life! Do not stay @ this hotel!”
Reviews.Author: mm1989
Reviews.Content: First of all I'd like to start off by saying I work at a Hotel, a Platinum award winning hotel in Pennsylvania, so I know first hand what cleanliness and neatness is all about and this place had none of it! Our first few minutes we were in our room, I sprayed Lysol throughout (Thank God I brought it, if I didn't I would have bought it!) I then proceeded to check my bed linens, out of habit! I found 3 hairs on the one bed, none on the other but when I went to pull the sheets down and look at the mattress pad there were hairs balled up all over it, looked like it hadn't been changed in months, Our toilet wouldn't flush the first night, but everyday after that it did, The carpeting looked filthy dirty with stains all over it, Front desk had no blankets to give out at all, there was not even blankets on the bed! There were ants in the room, Room service was limited, they only gave us fresh towels and removed the trash but we had to go ask, not once did they knock on our door. (I would be embarrassed to if I were them!) There was no coffee pot, no phone, no Internet like mentioned, The fridge made all of our drinks frozen for 2 days, When we shut the door the entire window shook, It was very loud there and I myself could not get comfortable nor sleep, when I turned my head to the left the smell of mold made me get out the Lysol! The pool was a whole other experience, the water looked murky, We had to pass the laundry room to get to the pool and I just could not believe my eyes!! If you are looking for a cheap place to stay, I would NOT recommend this hotel and you can bet I will be talking about this one for years to come, what a horrible experience for what was supposed to be a great family escape, it was anything but that.

Reviews.Title: “Cheap, but not worth it...”
Reviews.Author: sungirl4206
Reviews.Content: This place is probably the cheapest hotel to stay at in Ocean City, MD. The price and location are perfect. During my first stay, my friend and I woke up in the middle of the night when our door floor open. It was locked. Turned out the lock didn't work and you could push through the door whether it was locked or not. They fixed it but didn't apologize and seemed annoyed that we would even complain about our safety. My second stay (I should have known better) we were put in the cheapest rooms in their South Beach location (8th and Philadelphia). We were not given any towels when we checked in nor were we given any on each subsequent night. The lamp was broken, no phones, no alarm clock, no mirror, no closet... The bed headboard was broken. The bathroom was hardly clean upon check in and there was hair on the toilet seat. Again, they don't really care about anything you complain about. They are not apologetic and really don't care how you feel about your stay. Nor do they care that they make your stay as comfortable as possible. Yes, this is cheap, but it is worth spending the extra $20-$40 and staying in a half decent place. TRUST ME!

Reviews.Title: “This place is Absolutely TERRIBLE!”
Reviews.Author: malua820
Reviews.Content: A/C did not work at all. We had to put the bed right in front of the a/c to get a small amount of air. It was cooler outside than in. The bunk beds were held up by cement blocks, plyboard, and duct tape. The top railing wasnt attached to the bed so BEWARE of the bunk beds. The room was not serviced all week, so we left a day early. The ants were terrible....all over the place in the kitchen. We emptied our own trash, and had to ask for fresh towels each day. The carpets were filthy; we had to keep our sandals on. The parking issue is horrible. We had to drive our SUV over the curb, just to get in the stone pathway. There were people making out in the pool, so it was no place for children. The blinds don't fit the windows, and you can see in from the outside. It is extremely loud all night; people hollering and yelling. If you have children or teenagers, this is no place to stay, and if you like clean and sanitary environments DO NOT STAY HERE!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “DO NOT STAY HERE”
Reviews.Author: akarts13
Reviews.Content: I was looking to spend a relaxing weekend in Ocean City with my family, but didn't want to spend a fortune. I thought I found a gem after stumbling across the Parrot Lagoon website. I wasn't looking for anything fancy, just a place to lay our heads at night and shower after the beach. Let me start with the positive...it is close to the beach, that's about it for the positives. Now everything else: -sheets were dirty (brought my own sheets thankfully) -ants! -black mold in the shower (wear your shoes in the shower) -security (your door locks with a thumb turn lock, like you'd have on your inside doors) -air conditioning when on sounds like a disel engine idling -couldn't take children to the pool (people were cussing up a storm each time we tried) -parking...MAYBE you'll get a parking spot at the southbeach house! In addition it is REALLY hard to manuevure in the stone lot. Our mini van had to "jump the curb" in order to turn in! -don't expect to sleep well since anytime another door shuts in the southbeach house your door rattles (making you think someone is coming in)...the walls are very thin and you can hear EVERYTHING -water problem...after flushing the potty...hope it goes down...but then don't flush for another 15 minutes -someone spilled something down the backside of the bed ...looked like cola...it was never cleaned and was attracking ants in the bed...YUCK I felt like I was a senior in high school staying down at senior week because these were the type of places we could afford. It's sad when your 12 year old is scared to stay someplace because he's afraid someone is going to break in!

Reviews.Title: “Couldn't ask for any better.”
Reviews.Author: Remous
Reviews.Content: The room was indeed small but it was just a place to stay overnight and shower at. me and my three buddies stayed for a full week so it was only 100 dollars each. The pool was surprisingly nice. The room was also clean. This place is great for teens who just need a place to stay and crash but as for families its a close call. If you plan on hanging out in the room this place isnt for you. Why would you hang here though when the beach is only 2 blocks away?!??! I would defintley stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Very Unproffesional”
Reviews.Author: 588ciro
Reviews.Content: I was very concerned about the reviews I read, but I never arrived and still had a bad experience. I booked on 4 days notice over the internet so it was impossible to cancel with 7 days notice. My children and my childcare provider all came down with a stomach flu 12 hours before our departure and I attempted to cancel. I recieved no help at all and could not reach management and was charged $165 and never stepped into Maryland

Reviews.Title: “AVOID AT ALL COSTS”
Reviews.Author: jlwindsor
Reviews.Content: This motel looks like one where you rent the room by the hour. The room was so dirty and there was a ton of mold and mildew, my throat starting closing up immediately. The windows would not shut all the way, and most of the other people at this motel were younger people who came for a cheap place to hook up and get drunk. This is NOT a good place for a family. We did not even stay for 5 minutes it was so discusting. I don't think we are getting refunded for the money for the two nights we booked this motel. I would warn most people NOT to go here, unless you are looking for a cheap room and don't mind the odor and filth. This was also one of the smallest rooms I have ever seen.

Reviews.Title: “Bad choice on my part”
Reviews.Author: dawn70
Reviews.Content: The room was okay. Had some mold in the bathroom and needed new caulking around the tub. There was no phone in the unit. Pulled out the sofabed for the kids to sleep on and there were no sheets and only 1 extra pillow! The worst part is they charged me for 2 nights when I only stayed for 1 night and now the manager is away so I have to wait to get my refund.

Reviews.Title: “terrible”
Reviews.Author: karatekat22000
Reviews.Content: i booked this hotel via website... boy did i learn my lesson, always look at the hotel before booking it. when i got there they said they did not have my reservation, and there were no more rooms so that left my family and i stranded with no room, i addressed this to the manager and he apoligized for the inconvienience and offered me a left over room that i did not want i asked for a suite they tried to give me a i bedroom with no shades on the window a small shower with no sink we would have to use the dirty kichenette sink, the rugs were stained and the furniture stunk there were crumbs on the couch,well i had to pay 3 hundred dollars more to stay in a different hotel that was across the street and loved it it is called the paradise plaza... try it.

Reviews.Title: “Sleepless in Ocean City”
Reviews.Author: ilovebeach31
Reviews.Content: We recently stayed at Parrot Lagoon Miami Beach. Fortunately, the weather was very nice so we did not spend too much time in the room and we only booked for two nights, thank goodness. It was an economy room, which meant it was very small, which we may have been able to deal with; however, the room was dirty, there were crumbs on the floor and a toenail or fingernail, either way it was very gross. The bathroom shower stall was very very small and was moldy all along the ceiling, and there were no places to put your shampoo and soap. The sink began leaking after the first night and the drain began to clog. To top it off, there were ants everywhere in the bathroom. So, not a great motel experience. Needless to say, we left as soon as possible on check out day.

Reviews.Title: “NOT GOOD”
Reviews.Author: donohue309
Reviews.Content: The Hotel is very basic as far as accommodations. It is sub par as far as security , customer service and cleanliness. The door to my room did not close properly or lock. I had to rely on the chain lock only. A vagrant tried to slip his hand inside the door and unlatch the chain lock. I called security. When I asked for clean sheets, towels and a garbage bag, I was told it was not thier policy to provide these items to high school seniors. I paid the same amount of money to stay there as any one else of any age. I was invited to pack up the dirty items and take them to thier laundy facilities three blocks away. I left feeling that my patronage was not appreciated. I would not recommend this establishment to anyone. There are much better places to stay in Ocean City that still understand what customer satisfaction means and take pride in it.

Reviews.Title: “Good Place for the $$”
Reviews.Author: JimmyBaltimore_MD
Reviews.Content: This place was perfect for a group of friends getting together. We went on Memorial Day weekend and the prices were lower than anywhere else around. We got a room with a kitchen. It was huge! We could have fit another bed in there and still have room for the dinning room table. The bathroom was huge. We had our own pinic table on our porch. The room was clean, the beds were comfortable, and we had a great time. You can walk to the boardwalk, the beach, beer stores, and to a free fishing pier. You are not guaranteed a parking spot, but there is plenty of free parking on the surrounding streets which we only had to use once. I would definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Not as Nice as you think”
Reviews.Author: ang22877
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel for 3 days, It was not as nice as you would think from the pictures online, first of all you dont get a parking spot with your room so if you go out and there is not parking in the lot o well you have to drive around looking for some were to park, the room was not very clean i had to buy a can of lysol to spray everything, the lamps were broken, the carpets were stained, the beds were horrible i would'nt let my daughter sleep on the comforter, i had to but my own sheets down over the ones that were there and her own blanket she used also the outside of the hotel does not look nice, its just not taken care of at all. this is not a family hotel at all its ok for a couple or spring break kids, not for kids at all.

Reviews.Title: “Not What I Expected”
Reviews.Author: FalinAngel
Reviews.Content: I won't say the stay was terrible, but it did leave something to be desired. Upon check-in (which they allowed us to do early) they said that they first need to inspect the cleaning. When we arrived to the room, I needed to do some light cleaning. The ceiling fans blades had a coating of dust bunnies , the filter in the Air conditioner needed rinsed, and the sink, and tub needed wiped down. We had no channels in the back bedroom, we called the front desk (w/ our cell phone as there are no phones in the rooms) they assured us someone would be right down. We left our room at noon and returned at approx. 4pm...still no cable. We called back and were told that there was no request, but they could get it fixed by 6. The following day we went to the beach after my childrens bathes we realized it would be a loooong time. A half full tub took 1 1/2 hours to drain. By the time I finished my shower the tub was a quarter full again. If staying here schedules bathes and showers VERY far apart. The air conditioning was more like a fan. We stayed in a kin suite which is a bedroom, livingroom, bathroom; the air conditioner is very tiny and located in the livingroomso it did very little for our children in the bedroom. The coffee pot comes with a metal pot and makes the coffee taste like a tin can....I suggest bringing your own from home. And don't plan on plugging in your microwave, coffee pot and refridgerator all at the same time, because they designed the rooms with the purpose of making this impossible. We noticed that all the billboards on the Parrot Lagoon Properties boasted stay 2 nights get 1 free. When we questioned the front desk about it, we were told it was a weekday special (we stayed Tues-Wed-Thurs nights) and it was for walk ins only. After we got back home I checked their website and sure enough it also states stay 2 nights get 1 free. I called and asked why I was charged a full 3 nights and no real reason was given other than you must have not mentioned it and now there's nothing we can do. All in all it was okay for the price, but in future visits I will spend the extra $10 a night to stay elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: “Really great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Nascarhoney
Reviews.Content: We were not sure what to expect after reading the reviews, but we gave it a shot anyway. Well to our complete surprise the Parrot Lagoon Miami was more then worth the trip. The cost was great and the room we had was huge. We rented an efficiency and it was a great room. The stafff was great and very friendly. The maids were fantastic. The pool was nice and very well kept and quiet. The total trip to the Parrot Lagoon was amazing. Would most certainly stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for...”
Reviews.Author: penguinsgomoo
Reviews.Content: I feel like I cannot complain too much because my boyfriend and I got a room right away for only $59 a night. Plus when you paid for two nights you got the third one free. But there were ants. Lots of ants. I would wake up to one crawling on my arm... disgusting. And we were on the second floor... I can't even imagine how it was on the first floor.

Reviews.Title: “Not horrible”
Reviews.Author: mrbinder
Reviews.Content: I had read other reviews on this hotel in Ocean City. I was expecting a horrible experience. However, I stayed in the 'king suite' and found it to be not bad. It had been freshly painted. I took my own sheets and a cover for the couch to make myself more comfortable but I would not have needed sheets. They looked clean and fresh. The carpet was a little dirty and I'm glad I covered the couch but I probably did not need to. The location was perfectly in the middle of the boardwalk, although two blocks away. Not a bad experience.

HotelInfo.Name: Parrot Lagoon Miami Beach
HotelInfo.Address: 301 2nd street, Ocean City, MD 21842
